Welcome to Yay Tour

Thank you for choosing to use Yay Tour("we", "us", or "our"). Yay Tour recommends events to users and connects them with buddies to attend those events together.

By accessing or using our app, services, or any associated software provided by Yay Tour, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms").


Changes to These Terms

We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will always post the most current version on our app. By continuing to use Yay Tour, you accept any revised Terms.


Privacy Policy

  • You are responsible for keeping your password secure.


    Content and User Submissions

  • We do not claim ownership of your content, but you grant us a license to use it.

Use of Services

You must not abuse, harass, threaten, impersonate, or intimidate other Yay Tour users.


Event Recommendations

We provide event recommendations based on a variety of factors. We make no guarantees about the suitability or quality of any event we recommend.

In order to unsubscribe from the Service, users must text STOP by sms or instagram dm or email us at liangzhen@yaytour.com


Finding Event Buddies

We facilitate connections between users for the purpose of attending events together but are not responsible for the actions of users who connect through Yay Tour.
